title: The Constraints Are Reversed
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be "},{"type":"text","text":"positive integers","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":" such that 11 divides "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+13n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and 13 divides "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+11n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What is the minimum value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"?"}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+13n \equiv 0 \pmod {11}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" m+11n \equiv 0 \pmod {13}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". (We add "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"13n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to the first and second equations respectively to get)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+13n+11n = m+24n \equiv 11n \equiv 0 \pmod{11}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+13n+11n = m+24n \equiv 13n \equiv 0 \pmod{13}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+24n \equiv 0 \pmod {11,13}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we can deduce that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+24n \equiv 0 \pmod {143}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+24n = 143k"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for some integer "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"But since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m,n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are positive, then to minimize "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" must be positive but as small as possible, and the smallest positive integer is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+24n = 143(1) = 143"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". We then maximize "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" such that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m = 143-24n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is still positive."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The largest satisfying "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and the corresponding "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"23"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", so our answer is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"23+5 = \boxed{28}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"13"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" divides "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6\left( m+11n \right)=\left( 6m+n \right)+65n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"13"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" divides "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6m+n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" divides "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6\left( m+13n \right)=6m+n+77n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" also divides "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6m+n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Hence "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11\times 13=143"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" divides "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6m+n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", so that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6m+n=143k"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for some positive integer "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6\left( m+n \right)=143k+5n=6\left( 24k+n \right)-\left( k+n \right)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" divides "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k+n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" so that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k+n\ge 6"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6\left( m+n \right)=143k+5n=138k+5\left( k+n \right)\ge 168"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Consequently "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+n\ge 28"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and this is attained if "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m=23"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n=5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            And what if i multiply 13n+m by 11n+m and get 0 mod 143 ,and realize that this implies that 24mn+m^2.is equal to 0 mod 143 and so m(24n+m) equal to 0 mod 143 so n equals to 5 and m equal to 23 is the least value?

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" m + 13n \equiv 0  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"   (mod 11)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" m + 11n \equiv 0  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"   (mod 13)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Starting with the second equation we can deduce that:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" m + 11n \equiv 0 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"   (mod 13)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" m  \equiv 2n  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"   (mod 13)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" m = 13k + 2n "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This can then substituted into the first equation as follows:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 13k + 2n + 13n \equiv 0  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"   (mod 11)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 13k + 15n \equiv 0  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"   (mod 11)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 2k + 4n \equiv 0  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"   (mod 11)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" k + 2n \equiv 0  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (mod 11)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 9n \equiv k  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (mod 11)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" n \equiv 5k  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (mod 11)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"  n = 11j + 5k "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now we can re-write the sum "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" m + n "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as :"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"28k + 33j "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now since both "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" m "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"  n "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are both positive the sum must be more than 0. Hence setting "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" k = 1 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" j = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" minimizes the sum to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \boxed{28} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11p=m+13n "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
13q=m+11n "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
can be written as,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11y=m+2n "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
13z=m-2n "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
solving,  "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11y+13z=2m "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
11y-13z=4n  "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"so by substituting for y,z we can know that either y,z both are even or odd. And 11y>13z.    "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"first, possible values for y and z are y=3,z=1   for which m=23 and n=5.  "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"And the next possible values for y and z are y=5,z=3 for which m=47 and n=4 and so on but greater than 28."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"so the least possible sum can be 28."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
